EmailTemplate.name: SHP CSAT Survey Email to SHP Contact Broker
EmailTemplate.subject: Did we meet your expectations?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for contacting Sutter Health Services on {!Contact.CreatedDate}
At Sutter Health Services we strive to improve our services through customer feedback. We invite you to take a short survey to rate your experience.
Please click on the link below to access the online survey:
http://sutterhealth.force.com/SurveyForce/TakeSurvey?id=a0AG000000VHmo3MAD&cId={!Contact.Id}&caId={!Case.Id}
Thank you for your time.
Sincerely, SHP Leadership Team
